name: Pingu.Land
description: Pingu.Land is a Wild West-themed memecoin project that has been revitalized with a fresh focus on community engagement, captivating visuals, and innovative features. The project introduces vibrant characters and rich storytelling to create an engaging experience for its community. Pingu.Land has launched a new website with upgraded artwork and plans to roll out a portfolio management bot, a Burn-O-Meter to monitor burns based on market cap milestones, and an exciting mobile game in the future.
